# Foreword {.unnumbered}

::: {.content-hidden unless-meta="show-instructions"}

:::: {.callout-important}
## How to customize the Foreword

- To modify the foreword text, edit the `content/0.1_foreword.qmd` file.
- To add an author to the foreword, add the author's name to the `authors` list in the YAML header of the `0.1_foreword.qmd` file. For example:
```yaml
authors:
    - name: Ima Author
```
- To remove the foreword section, edit the `_quarto.yml` file and remove the `- content/0.1_foreword.qmd` line.
- To hide these instructions, set `show-instructions: false` in the `_quarto.yml` file.
::::
:::
